thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com | 276 2
thread.title: Mitia Marchionni
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Mitia Marchionni

author: Mitia Marchionni
title: Mitia Marchionni
text:
Banggood is an awesome online store for gadget, diy electronics and more.
After a lot of shippings and different kind of items I must say that I'm very happy.
It happens some time to have some problem with the quality of an item or with the shipment (but it's understandable when you have so many items available, it happens with amazon too), in those rare cases Banggood has shown me a very nice customer center. They've always found a solution to the problems I faced.
I'll keep buying with confidence and reccommend Banggood with no reservations at all!
